020b05d4e9d60536283808ec335507c1e8c82993.query:
SELECT
                            DISTINCT ON (trainee, certification)
                            id,
                            instructor,
                            trainee,
                            certification,
                            notes,
                            passed,
                            valid_for,
                            valid_until,
                            created
                        FROM
                            certifications_trials
                        WHERE
                            passed IS TRUE
                            AND (valid_until > NOW())
                            AND valid_until < NOW() + $1 * INTERVAL '1 day'
                        ORDER BY trainee, certification, created DESC

0279d05fdc27ad1fd760b385c1afd68e1fe176ee.query: INSERT INTO gear_bank_purchases (member, class, quantity, global, cost) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, (SELECT cost FROM gear_item_current_cost($2)))

031d9ed2a6dd08f32de745818187dd8910cf606b.query: INSERT INTO gear_loadouts (member, loadout) VALUES ($1, $2) ON CONFLICT (member) DO UPDATE SET loadout = $2

05701ce57600da9f75a08befb898f7f4c516a53e.query:
INSERT INTO missions (id, name, summary, description, type, archived)
                                    VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, false)
                                    ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET
                                        name = $2,
                                        summary = $3,
                                        description = $4,
                                        type = $5,
                                        archived = false

1064a304ef408c4e242dc6c47c5ffcdf9ab3ec43.query:
SELECT
                            valid_for
                        FROM
                            certifications
                        WHERE
                            id = $1

1de41f7aead3bb3e5e5923d1d88ea092d9b9faf9.query: INSERT INTO gear_bank_transfers (source, target, amount, reason) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)

3bb77da35adb64b25c4f0d1d9232bfca9633b231.query: SELECT i.class, i.roles, i.global, gear_item_base_cost(i.class) as base, c.cost, c.end_date FROM gear_items i, LATERAL gear_item_current_cost(i.class) c WHERE i.enabled = TRUE

3e9ba4b407c3eba4d40d4d3aff74356077576b4f.query:
INSERT INTO
                            members_dlc (member, dlc)
                        VALUES
                            ($1, $2)
                        ON CONFLICT (member)
                        DO UPDATE
                            SET dlc = $2

4efaab44dd6e786c4182108767fa7d5d41160284.query: SELECT i.global, gear_item_base_cost(i.class) as base, c.cost, c.end_date FROM gear_items i, LATERAL gear_item_current_cost(i.class) c WHERE i.class = $1

56abd10226b406a046e2ec1b8f65eca6ca18feab.query: SELECT loadout FROM gear_loadouts WHERE member = $1 LIMIT 1

599656998a4b7d69c2f86e6415712a7c2cb5d133.query: INSERT INTO recruitment_seen (link) VALUES ($1) ON CONFLICT (link) DO UPDATE SET created = NOW()

5c15a2c4fcf938e63fd5f83d38c83e7a72e4d6e4.query: SELECT id, name, summary, description, type as "typ: MissionType" FROM missions WHERE id = $1

640b8e8639f83b99f78f66d250b2d63859c65159.query:
SELECT
                            id,
                            name,
                            link,
                            roles_required,
                            roles_granted,
                            valid_for,
                            created
                        FROM
                            certifications

660fca0a7936da8a65c41df8368ccf7d44c98503.query: SELECT scheduled, member, state as "state: Rsvp", details FROM missions_schedule_rsvp WHERE scheduled = $1

6cc6995e52aae1b6cb67db83edd8da57a70a3a2f.query:
INSERT INTO
                                certifications_trials
                                (instructor, trainee, certification, notes, passed, valid_for)
                            VALUES
                                ($1, $2, $3, $4, true, $5)
                            RETURNING
                                id,
                                instructor,
                                trainee,
                                certification,
                                notes,
                                passed,
                                valid_for,
                                valid_until,
                                created

713a1d9e5f789e6d6c953a9d3441c676b8df4108.query: INSERT INTO gear_locker_log (member, class, quantity) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

7aaf7df0249d598b495cb25c28f4bb7be055c109.query: SELECT * FROM missions_schedule WHERE start + '2 minutes'::Interval > NOW() ORDER BY start ASC

815617522fc3f0a9a5f494efd0416f0c84049552.query: UPDATE missions_schedule SET schedule_message_id = $1 WHERE id = $2

847ee51076e7d2e7e0162cb6dc7f51b014720087.query: INSERT INTO gear_bank_deposits (member, amount, reason, id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)

854aefb7c8239c70da427eb68d83a093a076b972.query: INSERT INTO missions_schedule_rsvp (scheduled, member, state, details) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4) ON CONFLICT (scheduled, member) DO UPDATE SET state = $3, details = $4

8f58acc714f280ed531e62dd5b77fe9afa6c3404.query:
SELECT
                            c.id,
                            c.name,
                            c.link,
                            c.roles_required,
                            c.roles_granted,
                            c.valid_for,
                            c.created
                        FROM
                            certifications c
                        INNER JOIN
                            certifications_instructors ci
                        ON
                            ci.certification = c.id
                        WHERE
                            ci.member = $1

9710594c233f7ed7960a122bcec5394465e054e8.query: SELECT member, amount, reason, id, created FROM gear_bank_deposits WHERE member = $1

a492865c0f8c52b770613822d17d029c4b8925a1.query: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM recruitment_seen WHERE link = $1) AS value

a80cd694ff0906d3d1e9f3ba97a307232d766bfb.query:
SELECT
                            DISTINCT ON (trainee, certification)
                            id,
                            instructor,
                            trainee,
                            certification,
                            notes,
                            passed,
                            valid_for,
                            valid_until,
                            created
                        FROM
                            certifications_trials
                        WHERE
                            passed IS TRUE
                            AND (valid_until > NOW() OR valid_until IS NULL)
                        ORDER BY trainee, certification, created DESC

aca9efceaf3f1b2d4b026dbae5fe7fb903acb8da.query:
INSERT INTO
                            members_steam (steam, member)
                        VALUES
                            ($1, $2)
                        ON CONFLICT (member)
                        DO UPDATE SET
                            steam = $1

af9c8265fb20c70fa528e4e0519010e393c42b2f.query: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM missions_schedule WHERE start = $1) AS value

afbd9afacfcc77dece153c9e6138dbf636288112.query:
SELECT
                        name AS value
                    FROM
                        certifications
                    WHERE
                        id = $1

be9d7102a0c2621d3d42b660434065c449ff3ff5.query: SELECT balance FROM gear_bank_balance_cache WHERE member = $1 LIMIT 1

d1c8e3ee1a6be107baaaf1b068d6946b7c62f3db.query:
SELECT
                            id,
                            instructor,
                            trainee,
                            certification,
                            notes,
                            passed,
                            valid_for,
                            valid_until,
                            created
                        FROM
                            certifications_trials
                        WHERE
                            trainee = $1
                            AND passed IS TRUE
                            AND (valid_until > NOW() OR valid_until IS NULL)
                        GROUP BY id ORDER BY created DESC

d4b22c007b1776085c8d65b791c2ad147f53d254.query: INSERT INTO recruitment_replied (link) VALUES ($1) ON CONFLICT (link) DO UPDATE SET created = NOW()

dc9c428bc346fe4d412c80c129f2612b539bccfa.query:
SELECT
                            EXISTS(
                                SELECT
                                    1
                                FROM
                                    certifications_instructors
                                WHERE
                                    member = $1
                                    AND certification = $2
                            ) AS "instructor_certified!"

e44bf77aa7feb47efc20fa54fa81fe1caa7295b3.query: SELECT class, quantity FROM gear_locker WHERE member = $1

eaebec4df05a448e5a6a8083f1a7c6b3771229cc.query: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM recruitment_replied WHERE link = $1) AS value

ecfc862c94cf42f88643ab281575fcdf58c8e176.query:
SELECT
                            member AS value
                        FROM
                            members_steam
                        WHERE
                            steam = $1

ed029c4fa87ff5b45fbfdf0ad1f312c2f34061bc.query: SELECT id, name, summary, description, type as "typ: MissionType" FROM missions WHERE archived = FALSE AND (LOWER(missions.name) LIKE LOWER($1) OR LOWER(missions.id) LIKE LOWER($1)) ORDER BY name ASC

fa6b69f8918c2d69529145fdeb1afc796c758000.query:
INSERT INTO
                                certifications_trials
                                (instructor, trainee, certification, notes, passed)
                            VALUES
                                ($1, $2, $3, $4, false)
                            RETURNING
                                id,
                                instructor,
                                trainee,
                                certification,
                                notes,
                                passed,
                                valid_for,
                                valid_until,
                                created

fbcab6c3343b2f85657ecdb1c66c3bdcf5bce1a4.query: INSERT INTO gear_bank_purchases (member, class, quantity, global, cost) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, (SELECT global FROM gear_items WHERE class LIKE $2::VARCHAR(255)), (SELECT cost FROM gear_item_current_cost($2)))
